nodes.display_name: エターナル・スターライト
nodes.long_description:
ニューラルリンクを作動させて、戦場のすべてを知り尽くそう。あなたの艦隊を勝利へ導く進路を計画しながら、あらゆる規模の戦闘を体験しよう。VRのためにゼロから生み出された『エターナル・スターライト』で、戦術的スペースバトルをプレイ！

多種多様なエイリアンたちと出会い（または戦い）、テクノロジーを集めて艦船をアップグレード。人類に残されたコロニーを守りつつ、ハイパースペースジャンプによる次の目的地を計画しよう。

直感的なロコモーションシステムで、空間をつかむような感覚で自由に移動することが可能。ズームアウトして戦場全体を表示したり、戦闘機1機に焦点を合わせることもできる。座るか立つか、部屋全体を使うか、プレイ方法はあなた次第。
nodes.short_description: ニューラルリンクを作動させて、戦場のすべてを知り尽くそう。あなたの艦隊を勝利へ導く進路を計画しながら、あらゆる規模の戦闘を体験しよう。VRのためにゼロから生み出された『エターナル・スターライト』で、戦術的スペースバトルをプレイ！

nodes.long_description:
激活神经链接，获得战场的全知视角。体验不同规模的战斗，规划航行路线，引领你的舰队走向胜利。《永恒星光》是一款基于VR的太空战术战斗游戏。

来会会(并消灭)各种各样的外星生物，收集科技升级飞船，计划下一次超空间跳跃，保护人类仅存的殖民地。游戏中有几十艘飞船和上百种独特的飞船系统供你获取和使用。合理部署飞船的位置并使用它们独特的能力将是击败你敌人的关键。

这个游戏拥有直观的移动系统，你可以通过抓取飞船的方式来让它们自由地在空间中移动。你可以缩小视角来查看整个战场，也可以把视角集中在一艘飞船上。你可以坐着玩，站着玩或利用整个房间来玩。

新增内容：

无尽模式

5个可解锁派系供你选择，开启程序生成的全新冒险，抵达足以打破力量平衡的外形结构体——中心。全新的敌人，武器和任务由你来探索。选择适合自己的难度和盟友来获得更好的游戏体验。现在即可畅享数十项游戏更新和改进！
nodes.short_description: 激活神经链接，获得战场的全知视角。体验不同规模的战斗，规划航行路线，引领你的舰队走向胜利。《永恒星光》是一款基于VR的太空战术战斗游戏。

nodes.long_description:
뉴럴 링크를 활성화해 전지전능한 시점으로 전장을 바라보세요. 크고 작은 전투를 모두 경험하며 여러분의 함대를 승리로 이끄세요. < 이터널 스타라이트>는 처음부터 VR을 위해 설계된 전략적 우주 전투 게임입니다.

다채로운 외계 종족과 만나고(증발시키고), 그들의 기술을 수집해 우주선을 업그레이드하세요. 인류에게 남은 식민지를 방어하며 다음 초공간 점프를 계획하세요. 

직관적인 가상 이동 시스템을 활용해, 주변 공간을 손으로 잡아 자유롭게 움직일 수 있습니다. 줌 아웃으로 전장 전체를 관망하거나, 전투기 단 한 대에 집중하세요. 앉거나 서서, 또는 룸 스케일로 플레이할 수 있습니다.
nodes.short_description: 뉴럴 링크를 활성화해 전지적 시점으로 전장을 바라보세요. 크고 작은 전투를 모두 경험하며 여러분의 함대를 승리로 이끄세요. < 이터널 스타라이트> 는 처음부터 VR을 위해 설계된 전략 우주 전투 게임입니다.

nodes.long_description:
Activa el vínculo neural y obtén una vista omnisciente del campo de batalla. Vive el conflicto a cualquier escala mientras trazas el rumbo que llevará a tu flota a la victoria. “Luz Astral Eterna” es un juego de combate espacial táctico que se desarrolló desde cero para VR.

Conoce y desintegra especies alienígenas vistosas, consigue tecnología para mejorar las naves y planifica el próximo salto hiperespacial mientras defiendes las colonias humanas restantes.

Gracias al sistema intuitivo de locomoción, puedes agarrar el espacio para moverte con libertad. Acerca para ver todo el campo de batalla o concéntrate en un solo caza. Juega en una silla, de pie o a escala de cuarto completo.
nodes.short_description: Activa el vínculo neural y obtén una vista omnisciente del campo de batalla. Vive el conflicto a cualquier escala mientras trazas el rumbo que llevará a tu flota a la victoria. “Luz Astral Eterna” es un juego de combate espacial táctico que se desarrolló desde cero para VR.

nodes.long_description:
**Eternal Starlight** is the ultimate VR real-time strategy game, immersing you in a thrilling space adventure where you must defend your home world from the relentless Kraya armada. Meet (and vaporize) unique alien species, acquire advanced technologies to enhance your fleet while you unlock new ships and loadouts for your next epic battle.

{410171498810852}

### **COMMAND YOUR FLEET**

Eternal Starlight features an innovative first-person movement and interaction system, allowing you freeze time and meticulously plan your attack strategy. Effortlessly zoom in and out of 3D space to coordinate your fleet's movements and utilize your special weapons systems to maximum effect. 

### **FEATURES**

* Real-time strategy space combat with tactical depth
* 28 story campaign missions with 3 difficulty levels
* Procedurally generated Endless Mode with customizable rules and modifiers
* Skirmish mode to create your own battles
* Over 100 unique weapons and special ship systems to salvage and equip
* Complex gameplay and deep strategies will keep you coming back
* Voice command support for issuing orders without lifting a finger
* Hand tracking support for controller-free play
* Play standing, seated or in full room-scale VR
nodes.short_description: **Eternal Starlight** is the premier VR real-time strategy game. Embark on a space adventure to protect your home world from the invading Kraya armada. Meet (and vaporize) unique alien species, acquire new technologies to upgrade and equip your fleet while you unlock new ships and loadouts for your next combat mission.

nodes.long_description:
Stelle eine neurale Verbindung her und verschaffe dir einen Überblick über das gesamte Schlachtfeld. Betrachte den Konflikt aus allen möglichen Blickwinkeln und schlage den Kurs ein, der deine Flotte zum Sieg führt. „Eternal Starlight“ ist ein taktisches Weltraumkampfspiel, das speziell für VR entwickelt wurde.

Triff (und vaporisiere) bunte außerirdische Völker, sammle Technologien, um deine Schiffe zu verbessern, und plane deinen nächsten Sprung durch den Hyperraum, während du die letzten Kolonien der Menschheit verteidigst.

Dank des intuitiven Bewegungssystems kannst du dich frei im Weltraum fortbewegen, indem du danach greifst. Zoome heraus, um das gesamte Schlachtfeld zu sehen, oder konzentriere dich auf einen einzigen Jäger. Spiele im Sitzen, im Stehen oder nutze den ganzen Raum.
nodes.short_description: Stelle eine neurale Verbindung her und verschaffe dir einen Überblick über das gesamte Schlachtfeld. Betrachte den Konflikt aus allen möglichen Blickwinkeln und schlage den Kurs ein, der deine Flotte zum Sieg führt. „Eternal Starlight“ ist ein taktisches Weltraumkampfspiel, das speziell für VR entwickelt wurde.

nodes.long_description:
Activez votre lien neural pour adopter un point de vue omniscient du champ de bataille. Vivez le conflit à plusieurs échelles, au fil de manœuvres planifiées jusqu'à la victoire de votre flotte. «Lueur d'Astre Éternel» est un jeu de combat spatial tactique, entièrement dédié à la VR.

Rencontrez (et atomisez) des races extraterrestres pittoresques, récupérez des technologies pour améliorer vos vaisseaux et préparez votre prochain saut en hyperespace, tout en défendant les ultimes colonies de l'espèce humaine.

Grâce à un système de déplacement intuitif, vous pourrez librement bouger dans l'espace en le manipulant. Dézoomez pour apercevoir la totalité du théâtre d'affrontement ou concentrez-vous sur un seul chasseur. Jouez assis, debout ou à travers toute la pièce.
nodes.short_description: Activez votre lien neural pour adopter un point de vue omniscient du champ de bataille. Vivez le conflit à plusieurs échelles, au fil de manœuvres planifiées jusqu'à la victoire de votre flotte. «Lueur d'Astre Éternel» est un jeu de combat spatial tactique, entièrement dédié à la VR.

nodes.long_description:
Activate your Neural Link to gain an omniscient view of the battlefield. Experience the conflict at any scale, as you plot the course that will lead your fleet to victory. Eternal Starlight is a tactical space combat game, built from the ground up for VR.

Meet (and vaporize) colorful alien species, collect technology to upgrade your vessels and plot your next hyperspace jump while defending the remaining colonies of the human race. 

Utilizing an intuitive locomotion system, you can freely move through space by grabbing it. Zoom out to view the entire battlefield or focus in on a single fighter. Play seated, standing or in full room scale.

Preorder today and get the exclusive Fusion Blast starting loadout. It will be a valuable asset in the war against the Kraya armada.
nodes.short_description: Activate your Neural Link to gain an omniscient view of the battlefield. Experience the conflict at any scale, as you plot the course that will lead your fleet to victory. Eternal Starlight is a tactical space combat game, built from the ground up for VR.

nodes.change_log:
* Changes for Jump Nova, Fold and Teleport so that ships aren't launched into the void. If the target space becomes occupied, the action will be aborted.
* Wave Attack (Akudat-Dow system): Increased damage radius, projectile speed and DPS 
* Added missing sounds for Decelerator Beam (Akudat-Dow beam weapon)

* Changes for Jump Nova, Fold and Teleport so that ships aren't launched into the void. If the target space becomes occupied, the action will be aborted.
* Wave Attack (Akudat-Dow system): Increased damage radius, projectile speed and DPS 
* Added missing sounds for Decelerator Beam (Akudat-Dow beam weapon)

Fixes

* Fixes for occasional graphical flashing seen on the bridge
* Fixed hit-box issue with Ice asteroids that made them almost impossible to target
* Toned down the '2x enemy damage' modifier in Endless Mode
* Fixed issue with scene transitions where it would occasionally get stuck and require a restart

Previously:

* Endless Mode changes:
* The number of items available in the first store has been increased
* Increased +100 res for 'less resources' modifier in hard mode
* Points are now given for allies rescued and subtracted for allies lost (for ships of medium size and above)
* 'Protect' missions won't end as soon as one ally is killed and points will be awarded for each ally saved
* New Modifier: 'Adaptive fleets'. This option makes the strength of enemy fleets mirror your own fleet strength.
* New Modifier: Better store items option (+1 tech level)
* Fixed bug when playing with no-permadeath where the game would load with no mission choices
* A final score notification is shown when you finish the game in Endless Mode
* Negative modifiers now affect the total score modifier differently and shouldn't reduce your modifier as much as before
* Dionoid Lightning gun cooldown increased from 14 to 32 seconds.
* Fixed issue with Plasma ball item

Endless Mode changes:
* The number of items available in the first store has been increased
* Increased +100 res for 'less resources' modifier in hard mode
* Points are now given for allies rescued and subtracted for allies lost (for ships of medium size and above)
* 'Protect' missions won't end as soon as one ally is killed and points will be awarded for each ally saved
* New Modifier: 'Adaptive fleets'. This option makes the strength of enemy fleets mirror your own fleet strength.
* New Modifier: Better store items option (+1 tech level)
* Fixed bug when playing with no-permadeath where the game would load with no mission choices
* A final score notification is shown when you finish the game in Endless Mode
* Negative modifiers now affect the total score modifier differently and shouldn't reduce your modifier as much as before

Other changes:
* Dionoid Lightning gun cooldown increased from 14 to 32 seconds.
* Fixed issue with Plasma ball item

New:

Graphics Updates. Quest 3 now includes color enhancements, light bloom (glows) and new lighting effects.

Bugfixes:

- Fixed issue with voice commands not listening for new commands after the first one
- Other misc fixes
